text: Is there a way to integrate single sign-on or social sign-in to HubSpot forms? i.e. sign-in with Google / facebook / linkedin)
Trying to swap to a different template. and modules that arenâ€™t even in that template are still showing

Sounds like there is a flex column on the page. Flex columns can have default modules for "first use" situations. But once the page is saved it will try to migrate the modules to the new template if there is a flex module on the new template as well
If I choose the same module more than once, it groups them together on the template but only shows the module once on the left so I assume it thinks it's the same module ID.
